DOC.brief_summary: Purposes study : 1 ) To define comprehensive set descriptive health state related treatment cervical cancer ( e.g . radical hysterectomy , whole pelvic radiation , brachytherapy , chemoradiation ) 2 ) To define set descriptive health state related adverse event associate w treatment cervical cancer ( i.e . bladder dysfunction , pain , enteritis , fistula formation ) & 3 ) To derive , use validate method , set QoL related utility score correspond health state .
DOC.brief_title: Development & Validation Utilities Health States Relevant Cervical Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects valuate cervical cancer-related health state use visual analog score ( VAS ) TTO ( TTO ) method . The subject ask read pertinent health state description listen read aloud . She first ask place state continuum ( VAS ) zero 100 , 100 present perfect health zero present death . The TTO interview administer . The subject ask assume remain life expectancy 30 year , choose 30 year health state describe 29 year state perfect health . The utility health state , number zero one , calculate minimum number year patient would accept divide 30 . Each subject ask review valuate 20 health state course 60-90 minute .
DOC.criteria: Any member public age 18 without diagnosis cervical cancer participate study . Patients age 18 diagnosis cervical cancer eligible participate study . Any member public age 18 prior diagnosis cervical cancer exclude study . Any cervical cancer patient young 18 exclude study .
